cloud.title: Build a Virtual Private Cloud
cloud.description: Designed and configured a VPC in AWS, setting up subnets, internet gateway, and managing IP addresses with CIDR blocks for efficient cloud networking.

cloud.title: Creating a Private Subnet
cloud.description: Enhanced AWS networking by setting up a private subnet within a VPC, ensuring isolation and security with private route tables and custom network ACLs.

cybersecurity.title: ANZ Cyber Security Management
cybersecurity.description: Investigated emails for malicious content (phishing) and analyzed suspicious network activity via packet capture.

web.title: E-commerce Platform
web.description: A full-featured online store with payment integration and inventory management.
